Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to adding a 311 complaint category for noise from sirens
Items.MatterName: Adding a 311 complaint category for noise from sirens.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the commissioner of information technology and telecommunications to create a separate 311 category for rooftop activity complaints and to report annually regarding such complaints, and to require the commissioner of buildings to report annually regarding certain rooftop spaces
Items.MatterName: Requiring the commissioner of DOITT to create a separate 311 category for rooftop activity complaints and to report annually regarding such complaints.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring human translation of the 311 app
Items.MatterName: Requiring human translation of the 311 app.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the 311 customer service center to provide assistance relating to affordable internet programs
Items.MatterName: Requiring the 311 customer service center to provide assistance relating to affordable internet programs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a mobile application to support the efficient handling of 311 service requests by city employees
Items.MatterName: Creating a mobile application to support the efficient handling of 311 service requests by city employees.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the 311 customer service center to provide live chat functionality
Items.MatterName: Requiring the 311 customer service center to provide live chat functionality.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to 311 transmitting image and video data for service requests or complaints
Items.MatterName: 311 transmitting image and video data for service requests or complaints.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring that 311 allow persons to request snow and ice removal on pedestrian bridges and that those reports be routed to the appropriate agency
Items.MatterName: Requiring that 311 allow persons to request snow and ice removal on pedestrian bridges and that those reports be routed to the appropriate agency.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reports of illegal towing to 311
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the use of global positioning system coordinates for 311 complaints and service requests
Items.MatterName: Use of global positioning system coordinates for 311 complaints and service requests.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the 311 customer service center to accept requests for service and complaints using video call functionality
Items.MatterName: Requiring the 311 customer service center to accept requests for service and complaints using video call functionality.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to 311 transmitting image and video data for housing service requests or complaints
Items.MatterName: 311 transmitting image and video data for housing service requests or complaints.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing an estimated wait time to 311 call center customers
Items.MatterName: Providing an estimated wait time to 311 call center customers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to adding a 311 complaint category for dog runs
Items.MatterName: Adding a 311 complaint category for dog runs.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the number of steps to submit service requests or complaints on the 311 website and mobile application
Items.MatterName: Number of steps to submit service requests or complaints on the 311 website and mobile application.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the 311 customer service center to indicate that an agency is unable to respond to a service request or complaint and implement protocols providing proof of action
Items.MatterName: Requiring the 311 customer service center to indicate that an agency is unable to respond to a service request or complaint and implement protocols providing proof of action.
